page.title: 05LOCAL ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Wylam has many local groups with something to offer all ages.Apart from Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides there is also a Boys Brigade,Youth Group and Toddler Club. Sports enthusiasts may join tennis, cricket,football,badminton & angling clubs.For the less energetic you may prefer the Photographic Society ,Horticultural Society,Local History Society,dancing,art or chess. There is a flourishing Mothers Union & Womens Institute.Much support is given to charities like Shelter & Oxfam. There are local organisations of the Labour and Conservative Party .Much support is given to the Round Table ,the Parent Teachers Association and the Community Playing Fields Assoc. Friends of Wylam are involved in helping the elderly.Wylam even has an Amateur Dramatic Society!
